## BaseSeoProps.canonical property

Set the page canonical url.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canonical?: string;
```

## Remarks

Add this on a page per page basis when you want to consolidate duplicate URLs.

```js
canonical = 'https://www.canonical.ie/';

```
